CodeplexIssue.Title: Outlook's Explorer.InlineResponseClose event is not supported
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml: The InlineResponse event on the Explorer object is supported but the InlineResponseClose is not. Please implement it in the next version.

CodeplexComment.Author: SebastianDotNet
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml:
thanks for pointing this out.i have no idea why its missing. i use the last public beta from office 2013 to create the NetOffice source code. may it was not included here. i want add the InlineResponseClose event to NetOffice 1.4 tomorrow.
THX!*Sebastian

CodeplexComment.Author: PsiBlades
